terrainr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Add a uniform buffer around a bounding box

Source: R/add_bbox_buffer.R
add_bbox_buffer.Rd

This function calculates the great circle distance both corners of your bounding box are from the centroid and extends those by a set distance. Due to using great circle distance, calculations will not be exact.

add_bbox_buffer(bbox, distance, distance_unit = "meters")

Arguments

bbox

The original bounding box to add a buffer around. If not already a [terrainr::terrainr_bounding_box] object, will be converted.
distance

The distance to add to the buffer.
distance_unit

The units of the distance to add to the buffer, passed to [terrainr::convert_distance].

Examples

add_bbox_buffer(
  list(
    c(lat = 44.04905, lng = -74.01188),
    c(lat = 44.17609, lng = -73.83493)
  ),
  10
)
#> An object of class "terrainr_bounding_box"
#> Slot "bl":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.04899 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -74.01197 
#> 
#> 
#> Slot "tr":
#> An object of class "terrainr_coordinate_pair"
#> Slot "lat":
#>      lat 
#> 44.17615 
#> 
#> Slot "lng":
#>       lng 
#> -73.83484 
#> 
#>
